summary:
Tired of top model body girls everywhere? This mod extends body slider at both opposed poles¡

Slider changes are more noticeable ingame than with screens (and im not very good at making them too) but the images give an idea.
descriptionHtml:
Mod affects player and npc's as it replaces the limited body slider with another one to give more variety.

Body slider based on UNPB BBP and realistic body system mod, goes from extreme skinny (less than UNP petite) to extreme fatty (so, so fatty), added meshes for clothes and armors.
Mod is .esp-less and .esm-less, meshes are loose, doesen't include textures as it uses vanilla ones, (though you need unp textures ofc, didn't try if it looks ok with cbbe textures but it probably does).

As armors are a slighty skimpier than vanilla ones i added them as optional file in case you don't like them., hide armor is included in the main file as it is not skimpy.

-Requires Dawnguard-

Bugs: Clipping, but i managed to remove most of it, obviously the fattier the clippier.

Credit goes to vadersapp for his awesome mod, which i recommend also: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56093/?
author: The1holy
